{"id":1046185207,"question_id":3092,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"9Â months","timestamp":1694404653,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"275 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1046185207/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Moves to Spread Stones Over Grid","memory":"40.6 MB","code":"public class Solution {\n    public int minimumMoves(int[][] grid) {\n        // Base Case\n        int t = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)\n            for (int j = 0; j < 3; ++j)\n                if (grid[i][j] == 0)\n                    t++;\n        if (t == 0)\n            return 0;\n\n        int ans = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {\n            for (int j = 0; j < 3; ++j) {\n                if (grid[i][j] == 0) {\n                    for (int ni = 0; ni < 3; ++ni) {\n                        for (int nj = 0; nj < 3; ++nj) {\n                            int d = Math.abs(ni - i) + Math.abs(nj - j);\n                            if (grid[ni][nj] > 1) {\n                                grid[ni][nj]--;\n                                grid[i][j]++;\n                                ans = Math.min(ans, d + minimumMoves(grid));\n                                grid[ni][nj]++;\n                                grid[i][j]--;\n                            }\n                        }\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-moves-to-spread-stones-over-grid","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
